start: Leader Exchange Money welcomes you. I will help you to transfer money from Russia to another country and vice versa.
text_withdrawal: Where do you want to transfer funds?
text_transfer_amount: Specify the transfer amount in the text entry field: The amount is stated in USD (dollars)
text_confirm_transfer_amount: {{method}} You want to transfer an amount of {{summa}} USD to the recipient's card {{card number}}. Conversion is performed automatically depending on the currency of the recipient's card
incorrect_card_number: The card format is incorrect. Fill out the form again!
incorrect_amount: The amount should be between 20 and 10 000 USD
success_payment: Payment has been successfully paid! The money will be credited to the recipient's account within 24 hours Need Help? - Get in touch with us: @vaaxooo
about_text: The bot simplifies the transfer of funds to Russia and other countries despite sanctions. When transferring, there is an automatic conversion depending on the currency of the recipient's card Cash reserve: 42 415 USD, 514 351 RUB If you have any questions, you can contact support: @vaaxooo
